section.title: NAME
section.p: createCoord - Create a CoordNode in the cluster.

section.title: DESCRIPTION
section.p: Create a CoordNode in the cluster.

plentry.pd: Configuration file of the node, including setting log's size, whether open transaction.

ul.li: In a collection, we can create multiple nodes, but port number of each two nodes must be apart at least 5 ports, because each node's backend control 5 communication ports.

section.title: Examples
section.p: Create a Coord Node at port 11810, and set the log file size to 64MB.
